name: chamber-dashboard-crm
description: === Chamber Dashboard CRM === Contributors: cguntur, gwendydd, lisak.social Tags: Chamber of Commerce, CRM, customer relationship management, contacts, contacts directory for membership organizations Donate link: http://chamberdashboard.com/donate Requires at least: 4.6 Tested up to: 5.5 Requires PHP: 7.0 Stable tag: 1.5.5 License: GPLv3 License URI: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html

scripts.bundle: dir-archiver --src . --dest ../chamber-dashboard-crm.zip --exclude .DS_Store .stylelintrc.json .eslintrc .git .gitattributes .github .gitignore README.md composer.json composer.lock node_modules vendor package-lock.json package.json .travis.yml phpcs.xml.dist sass style.css.map

author: Chandrika Sista
